name: Crosswords Arena
description:
Word game for two players.

Features
  • Real-time multiplayer arena
  • Single-player mode with computer players
  • Dictionary with over 200 thousand English words
  • Highscore lists
  • Keyboard support
  • Playable in English or German

Open the game in a new tab for full keyboard support

Add this game to Chrome

Quick InstructionsPlace a word in the center of the board and press 'Submit'. All subsequent words must be connected. More information can be found in the game menu under 'About the game'
